name: Fists of Fury
description: Fist of Fury takes you, Bruised Knee, to the island fortress of a criminal warlord, Mr.Han. Whose martial arts academy covers up for their illegal activities. Determined to avenge the death of your sister, you infiltrate the enemies stronghold and enter the most brutal tournament of them all. Visit Mr. Hans torture chamber, See the famous hall of mirrors, plus more..... .......its time for you to Enter the Dragon.
